channel.title: Help Please
channel.description: What folders do i change to put my no-ip.org in? i think its the client.java and the server.java.... am i correct? and if not please tell me what folders i have to change 127.0.0.1 into my no-ip. Thanks, Adam.

item.title: Help Please
item.dc:creator: @broyou9222 broyou9222
item.description:
@broyou9222 wrote:

[quote=“adamgulka, post:3, topic:519468”][quote author=Int Bauk link=topic=637931.msg4299821#msg4299821 date=1368807300]
you can’t change the IP server sided lol, it’s client sided because the client connects to the server, and the server is hosted via the computers IP.

Client sided > client.java: server = “”;
[/quote]

So do i keep the Server.java as 127.0.0.1?[/quote]

yes, go to client.java on client side find server.equals(" change it to your no-ip) or public static String server = “change it to your no-ip”;

Read full topic
